channel.title: Tag2 on Terminal
channel.description: Recent content in Tag2 on Terminal

item.title: blogtitle
item.description:
Dillinger

The Last Markdown Editor, Ever

Dillinger is a cloud-enabled, mobile-ready, offline-storage compatible, AngularJS-powered HTML5 Markdown editor.

  • Type some Markdown on the left
  • See HTML in the right
  • ✨Magic ✨

Features

  • Import a HTML file and watch it magically convert to Markdown
  • Drag and drop images (requires your Dropbox account be linked)
  • Import and save files from GitHub, Dropbox, Google Drive and One Drive
  • Drag and drop markdown and HTML files into Dillinger
  • Export documents as Markdown, HTML and PDF
item.content:
Dillinger

The Last Markdown Editor, Ever

Dillinger is a cloud-enabled, mobile-ready, offline-storage compatible, AngularJS-powered HTML5 Markdown editor.

  • Type some Markdown on the left
  • See HTML in the right
  • ✨Magic ✨

Features

  • Import a HTML file and watch it magically convert to Markdown
  • Drag and drop images (requires your Dropbox account be linked)
  • Import and save files from GitHub, Dropbox, Google Drive and One Drive
  • Drag and drop markdown and HTML files into Dillinger
  • Export documents as Markdown, HTML and PDF
